name: Fenrir&Garmr
short_description:
This is a simple DLL Injection program written in Python2/Tkinter/ttk, utilizing python ctypes. The code injection method used is CreateRemoteThread/LoadLibraryA.

This was written & tested strictly for Windows. Use a correct architecture dll with like os/process for successful result.

I went ahead and compiled the script to two executables, one for x86 and the other for x64. The script and x64 exe have been tested and are working. x86 exe runs but I have yet to inject anything with it.

I will eventually expand this program to include functionality to run and inject raw shellcode. This will be the "Garmr" in Fenrir&Garmr lol

Support: irc.freenode.net #archseptem 
please report all bugs and troubleshooting information here.

"Entire ignorance is not so terrible or extreme an evil, and is far from being the greatest of all; too much cleverness and too much learning, accompanied with ill bringing-up, are far more fatal." --Plato
